constants.name: poloidal_plane_coordinates_identifier
constants.header: List of coordinate systems for describing the poloidal plane

int.name: rectangular
int.description: Cylindrical R,Z ala eqdsk (R=dim1, Z=dim2). In this case the position arrays should not be filled since they are redundant with grid/dim1 and dim2.

int.name: inverse
int.description: Rhopolar_polar 2D polar coordinates (rho=dim1, theta=dim2) with magnetic axis as centre of grid; theta and values following the COCOS=11 convention; the polar angle is theta=atan2(z-zaxis,r-raxis)

int.name: inverse_psi_straight_field_line
int.description: Flux surface type with psi as radial label (dim1) and the straight-field line poloidal angle (mod(index,10)=1) (dim2); could be non-equidistant; magnetic axis as centre of grid; following the COCOS=11 convention

int.name: inverse_psi_equal_arc
int.description: Flux surface type with psi as radial label (dim1) and the equal arc poloidal angle (mod(index,10)=2) (dim2)

int.name: inverse_psi_polar
int.description: Flux surface type with psi as radial label (dim1) and the polar poloidal angle (mod(index,10)=3) (dim2); could be non-equidistant

int.name: inverse_psi_straight_field_line_fourier
int.description: Flux surface type with psi as radial label (dim1) and Fourier modes in the straight-field line poloidal angle (mod(index,10)=4) (dim2), could be non-equidistant; magnetic axis as centre of grid; following the COCOS=11 convention

int.name: inverse_psi_equal_arc_fourier
int.description: Flux surface type with psi as radial label (dim1) and Fourier modes in the equal arc poloidal angle (mod(index,10)=5) (dim2)

int.name: inverse_psi_polar_fourier
int.description: Flux surface type with psi as radial label (dim1) and Fourier modes in the polar poloidal angle (mod(index,10)=6) (dim2); could be non-equidistant

int.name: inverse_rhopolnorm_straight_field_line
int.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[(psi-psi_axis)/(psi_edge-psi_axis)] (dim1) and the straight-field line poloidal angle (dim2)

int.name: inverse_rhopolnorm_equal_arc
int.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[(psi-psi_axis)/(psi_edge-psi_axis)] (dim1) and the equal arc poloidal angle (dim2)

int.name: inverse_rhopolnorm_polar
int.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[(psi-psi_axis)/(psi_edge-psi_axis)] (dim1) and the polar poloidal angle (dim2)

int.name: inverse_rhopolnorm_straight_field_line_fourier
int.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[(psi-psi_axis)/(psi_edge-psi_axis)] (dim1) and Fourier modes in the straight-field line poloidal angle (dim2)

int.name: inverse_rhopolnorm_equal_arc_fourier
int.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[(psi-psi_axis)/(psi_edge-psi_axis)] (dim1) and Fourier modes in the equal arc poloidal angle (dim2)

int.name: inverse_rhopolnorm_polar_fourier
int.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[(psi-psi_axis)/(psi_edge-psi_axis)] (dim1) and Fourier modes in the polar poloidal angle (dim2)

int.name: inverse_rhotornorm_straight_field_line
int.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[Phi/Phi_edge] (dim1) and the straight-field line poloidal angle (dim2)

int.name: inverse_rhotornorm_equal_arc
int.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[Phi/Phi_edge] (dim1) and the equal arc poloidal angle (dim2)

int.name: inverse_rhotornorm_polar
int.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[Phi/Phi_edge] (dim1) and the polar poloidal angle (dim2)

int.name: inverse_rhotornorm_straight_field_line_fourier
int.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[Phi/Phi_edge] (dim1) and Fourier modes in the straight-field line poloidal angle (dim2)

int.name: inverse_rhotornorm_equal_arc_fourier
int.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[Phi/Phi_edge] (dim1) and Fourier modes in the equal arc poloidal angle (dim2)

int.name: inverse_rhotornorm_polar_fourier
int.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[Phi/Phi_edge] (dim1) and Fourier modes in the polar poloidal angle (dim2)

int.name: inverse_rhopol_straight_field_line
int.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[psi-psi_axis] (dim1) and the straight-field line poloidal angle (dim2)

int.name: inverse_rhopol_equal_arc
int.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[psi-psi_axis] (dim1) and the equal arc poloidal angle (dim2)

int.name: inverse_rhopol_polar
int.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[psi-psi_axis] (dim1) and the polar poloidal angle (dim2)

int.name: inverse_rhopol_straight_field_line_fourier
int.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[psi-psi_axis] (dim1) and Fourier modes in the straight-field line poloidal angle (dim2)

int.name: inverse_rhopol_equal_arc_fourier
int.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[psi-psi_axis] (dim1) and Fourier modes in the equal arc poloidal angle (dim2)

int.name: inverse_rhopol_polar_fourier
int.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[psi-psi_axis] (dim1) and Fourier modes in the polar poloidal angle (dim2)

int.name: inverse_rhotor_straight_field_line
int.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[Phi/pi/B0] (dim1), Phi being toroidal flux, and the straight-field line poloidal angle (dim2)

int.name: inverse_rhotor_equal_arc
int.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[Phi/pi/B0] (dim1), Phi being toroidal flux, and the equal arc poloidal angle (dim2)

int.name: inverse_rhotor_polar
int.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[Phi/pi/B0] (dim1), Phi being toroidal flux, and the polar poloidal angle (dim2)

int.name: inverse_rhotor_straight_field_line_fourier
int.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[Phi/pi/B0] (dim1), Phi being toroidal flux, and Fourier modes in the straight-field line poloidal angle (dim2)

int.name: inverse_rhotor_equal_arc_fourier
int.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[Phi/pi/B0] (dim1), Phi being toroidal flux, and Fourier modes in the equal arc poloidal angle (dim2)

int.name: inverse_rhotor_polar_fourier
int.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[Phi/pi/B0] (dim1), Phi being toroidal flux, and Fourier modes in the polar poloidal angle (dim2)

int.name: irregular_rz_na
int.description: Irregular grid, thus give list of vertices in dim1(1:ndim1), dim2(1:ndim1) and then all fields are on values(1:ndim1,1)
